ch0090_50_daigo/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d run into you.
ch0090_50_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
I’d love to have a chat so you can tell me about
all of your adventures.
ch0090_50_daigo/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s not often that I get to dress up for a
special occasion.
ch0090_50_daigo/7101_0701_02_10: Come on, let’s enjoy the day together!
ch0090_50_daigo/7102_0701_01_10:
What do you and your Pokémon do when you
come across a really big obstacle?
ch0090_50_daigo/7102_0701_02_10: Rayquaza and I can simply soar right over it.
ch0090_50_daigo/7102_0701_03_10:
But using brute strength to smash through it or
circumnavigating it altogether are also perfectly
good options.
ch0090_50_daigo/7102_0701_04_10: There’s always more than one way to do things.
ch0090_50_daigo/7103_0701_01_10:
My partner Rayquaza is such a fascinating
Pokémon. Did you know it likes to eat meteorites?
ch0090_50_daigo/7103_0701_02_10:
I happen to love rocks and stones as well, so we
make an excellent team.
ch0090_50_daigo/7103_0701_03_10:
Though I am slightly worried that it might try to
gobble up my prized collection one day...
ch0090_50_daigo/7104_0701_01_10:
I spotted Wallace earlier today. He was smiling
ear to ear as he watched all the passersby moving
about the city.
ch0090_50_daigo/7104_0701_02_10:
We’re so lucky to be in a place full of smiles and
happy people.
ch0090_50_daigo/7105_0701_01_10:
I felt a thrill of excitement in my chest the first
time we battled... I’ll never forget it.
ch0090_50_daigo/7105_0701_02_10:
Every day I get to battle you feels like a
celebration of that first time!
ch0090_50_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! There’s something I want to give you.
ch0090_50_daigo/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure you’ll find a good use for it!
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you want to know why rocks and stones are so
amazing? I’d love to teach you.
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0701_02_10:
Other than gemstones, rocks are mostly plain and
colorless. Not much sparkle or shine.
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0701_03_10: But behind every stone is an incredible backstory.
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0701_04_10: Every stone you see has a reason for being there.
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0702_01_10:
It takes a long time for a stone to become what
it is, just like it takes time for us to grow and
become stronger.
ch0090_50_daigo/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope you and your Pokémon continue to deepen
your bond together as you grow on your journey.
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0701_01_10:
Standing at the very top can often feel like a
battle with yourself...
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
so I’m glad I get the opportunity to battle talented
sync pairs like you and your partner.
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0701_03_10:
It lets me feel that drive to aim even higher—
to feel the bond I’ve developed with my own
partner Pokémon.
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
Your partner seems to have a great deal of
trust in you.
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0702_02_10:
*chuckle* I can tell by the joyful expression on
its face alone!
ch0090_50_daigo/2511_0702_03_10: Rayquaza and I might have some competition!
ch0090_50_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
There are all sorts of Trainers out there! You
should spend your time enjoying this island and
meeting the people gathered here!
ch0090_50_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
As you explore Pasio, I want you to enjoy how it’s
constantly changing. See it with your own eyes,
and feel it in your heart!
ch0090_50_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
A lot has happened since I first met you. It’s been
fun, hasn’t it?
